name: dsabot
description: DSAbot app integrate Github and D.Track to orchestrate security vulnerabilities in third-party components.

scripts.build: yarn install && apk --no-cache add curl && curl -sfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aquasecurity/trivy/main/contrib/install.sh | sh -s -- -b /usr/local/bin v0.42.0
scripts.start: apk --no-cache add curl && curl -sfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aquasecurity/trivy/main/contrib/install.sh | sh -s -- -b /usr/local/bin v0.42.0 && NODE_ENV=development node index.js
